entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @thecjpearson @NYGovCuomo That poor child watching his mother assaulted by the very people sworn to protect them.  It makes me feel sick.  Coronavirus has never scared me.  Whats happening collectively around the world scares me.
